summary: A story about a family torn apart by a worker's strike. At first, the mother wants to protect her family from the troublemakers, but eventually she realizes that her son is right and the workers should strike.
cast: Vera Baranovskaya|Nikolay Batalov|Aleksandr Chistyakov|Anna Zemtsova|Ivan Koval-Samborsky|N. Vidonov|Aleksandr Savitsky|Vsevolod Pudovkin|Ivan Bobrov|Aleksandr Gromov|Fyodor Ivanov|Vyacheslav Novikov|Pavel Poltoratskiy|Nikolay Trofimov|Vladimir Uralskiy
title: La madre
